Title: Expands the age range eligibility for the rent subsidy payable to a foster child living independently
Summary: Expands the age range eligibility for the rent subsidy payable to a foster child living independently to age twenty-four.
LawCode: Amd ยง409-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to expanding the age range for eligibility for the rent subsidy payable to a foster child living independently
